title: Software Development
description: Learn to build real-world applications using modern programming languages, frameworks, and tools.

title: Robotics & AI
description: Master the fundamentals of robotics, automation, and artificial intelligence through hands-on projects.

title: UI/UX & Product Design
description: Create intuitive, engaging user experiences with design thinking and industry-standard tools.

title: Data Science & Analytics
description: Transform raw data into actionable insights using modern analytics and machine learning techniques.

title: Cybersecurity
description: Learn how to protect systems and networks from cyber threats through practical security training.

title: Cloud Computing
description: Gain hands-on skills in deploying, managing, and scaling applications in the cloud.

title: IoT & Embedded Systems
description: Design smart devices and connected systems that bridge the physical and digital worlds.

title: Game Development
description: Create interactive games with modern engines and storytelling techniques.

title: AR/VR Development
description: Build immersive augmented and virtual reality experiences for multiple platforms.

title: Entrepreneurship in Tech
description: Learn how to turn tech ideas into startups through innovation, planning, and execution.
